assignments.name: Assign_ETA_Comment_from_First_Screen
assignments.label: Assign ETA Comment from First Screen

assignments.name: Copy_1_of_Assign_Complaint_Case_Values
assignments.label: Copy 1 of Assign Complaint Case Values

choices.name: choiceMemberInformed
choices.choiceText: Member has been informed of ETA

choices.name: choiceNeedsCallback
choices.choiceText: Member needs call back with ETA

rules.name: User_is
rules.label: User is BO MP Full Access or BO AP - Payment Processor

Flow.description: Made change to set Dispatcher Status field for ETA Request which is required for the Omni Service Channel configuration to work. - Chris .Y -Updated Country to be Defaulted to "United States" -2024-08-23: Updated address screens to default State value, updated call type logic for ERS calls (limited access to cancel) -2024-10-10: Made breakdown address required in both paths, updated default address values for non-tow calls using formula JO -2024-11-12: Removed "Member has been informed of ETA" choice from ETA path -2024-11-12: Added Case Region + additional fields to ETA case creation -2024-11-19: Updated callbackCategory formula -2025-5-10: AGB updated for SSFI-956 Add Update Information for BO PM - Full Access, BO AP - Payment Processor -2025-07-14: JO updated parent case id to formula for SSFI-1210 -2025-09-11: MPatel Member Callback-->Updated Information replace Driver Directions with Drivers Notes. SSFI-1264(This was to remove changes related to SSFI-1315)

formulas.name: commentQueue
formulas.expression: IF( OR( ISPICKVAL({!pickCommentType},"Automotive Repair"), ISPICKVAL({!pickCommentType},"Smog Repair") ), "Automotive Comments", "ERS Comments" )

formulas.description: checks a few fields because not all are always completed
formulas.name: f_streetDefault
f_userIsBO
formulas.expression: IF(OR({!$Profile.Name}='BO PM - Full Access',{!$Profile.Name}='BO AP - Payment Processor'), True, False)

Flow.label: Member Callback Processing

value.stringValue: Thank you for calling AAA. I have canceled your service as requested. Is there anything else I can help you with?

fields.name: cancelDialog
fields.fieldText:
You are about to cancel service for {!Get_Parent_Case.Account.FirstName} {!Get_Parent_Case.Account.LastName}.


Click Next to continue or Previous to go back.

fields.name: etaCommentNeededText
fields.fieldText: A comment is required to create an ETA case. Please enter one below.

fields.name: displayCurrentTime
fields.fieldText: The current time is {!Get_Parent_Case.Local_Member_Time_Text__c}.

fields.name: noPtaText
fields.fieldText: We are currently working with our local service providers to find the best technician to assist you today. Would you like a call back when we have more information?

fields.name: displayUnassigned
fields.fieldText: We are currently working with our local service providers to find the best technician to assist you today. We still expect someone to arrive by {!Get_Parent_Case.Local_ETA_Text__c}. Would you like to be called once we have a better time of arrival?

fields.name: displayPTA
fields.fieldText: We expect a technician from {!Get_Parent_Case.FSL_Service_Appointment__r.ServiceTerritory.Name} to arrive by {!Get_Parent_Case.Local_ETA_Text__c}.

fields.name: displayETA
fields.fieldText: A service technician from {!Get_Parent_Case.FSL_Service_Appointment__r.ServiceTerritory.Name} is on their way to you now and should arrive by {!Get_Parent_Case.Local_ETA_Text__c}.

fields.name: etaAaLink
fields.fieldText: Click to display live location of technician.

fields.name: textAnythingElse
fields.fieldText: Is there anything else I can help you with today?

validationRule.errorMessage: Please complete all fields in Breakdown Address.
validationRule.formulaExpression: NOT(OR( ISBLANK({!breakdownAddress.city}), ISBLANK({!breakdownAddress.province}), ISBLANK({!breakdownAddress.countryCode}), ISBLANK({!breakdownAddress.street}), ISBLANK({!breakdownAddress.postalCode})))

validationRule.errorMessage: Please complete all fields in Breakdown Address.

fields.name: Is_AAR_COR
fields.helpText: Select this if Tow Destination is an Approved Auto Repair or Club Owned Repair shop

textTemplates.name: updatedFieldsForCase
